text: "Atlantic City" is a 1982 song by Bruce Springsteen and is the leading single from his sixth studio album Nebraska. It did not chart at all in the United Kingdom and the United States. It was covered by The Band for their eighth studio album Jericho. ==References== Category:1982 songs Category:Folk rock songs Category:Bruce Springsteen songs Category:The Band songs Category:John Anderson (singer) songs Category:Ryan Adams songs
title: Atlantic City (song)
